entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 7:24 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:24 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 7:24 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
